''Capital:'' [[Frosthaven]]
''Region: ''[[Tordannonhold]]
''Primary Resources:'' Copper, medicinal supplies, livestock
''Enemies:'' [[Droranath]], [[Narathun]]
''Celebrated Virtues: ''Empathy, generosity, loyalty. Always willing to help a friend in need, and always willing to make a new friend. {{||$:/ToldorathAndTordannon}}
title: Tordannon
